definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
Zicheng town in Yidu county 宜都[Yi2 du1], Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei
Jincheng (common place name)/Chincheng town in Kinmen County 金門縣|金门县[Jin1 men2 xian4] (Kinmen or Quemoy islands), Taiwan
urbanization level (of a city or town)
Toucheng town in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: Ted painted the town’s net red.
sentences.chinese: 泰德把城鎮的網塗成了紅色。

sentences.english: We should develop small towns on the Basis of existing county seats and of organic towns where conditions permit.
sentences.chinese: 發展小城鎮要以現有的縣城和有條件的建制鎮爲基礎。

sentences.english: The plan is for trains to make their first stop outside China in the border town of Boten in northern Laos.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃在中國邊境外的第一站是老撾北部城鎮磨憨。

sentences.english: Well, all right, I agree with you about that, but I still prefer a big town.
sentences.chinese: 額，行，我同意你的觀點，但是我仍然更喜歡大城鎮。

sentences.english: The good news ran through the whole town.
sentences.chinese: 這個好消息傳遍了這個城鎮。

sentences.english: A town on the northern coast of the Isle of Wight off southern England.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭南部威特島北岸的一個城鎮。

sentences.english: The tsunami that followed engulfed the northeast and wiped out entire towns.
sentences.chinese: 隨後的海嘯淹沒了日本東北，吞沒了整個城鎮。

sentences.english: The nearest town with potential was Salida.
sentences.chinese: 最近的城鎮有可能是薩里達。

sentences.english: The truck speeded up after it left town.
sentences.chinese: 卡車在離開城鎮之後加速。

sentences.english: Ultimately, it is good for healthy and orderly development of Bayannur's small towns.
sentences.chinese: 最終促進巴彥淖爾市小城鎮健康有序的發展。

sentences.english: The new advisory covers several towns northeast of the mandatory exclusion zone.
sentences.chinese: 新提議的疏散區包括了強制隔離區東北的幾個城鎮。

sentences.english: These towns already host hundreds of IDPs.
sentences.chinese: 這些城鎮現已收容了數百名國內流離失所者。

sentences.english: 'Location and traffic network' shows 3 stations in the town center. Please clarify.
sentences.chinese: 交通區位圖裏表示了城鎮中心有3個站點，請說明。

sentences.english: That small town is the last far-flung outpost of our country.
sentences.chinese: 那個小城鎮是我們國家一個遙遠的前哨基地。

sentences.english: There are unconfirmed reports that the two people have been shot in the neighboring town.
sentences.chinese: 未經證實的報道說在附近城鎮有兩個人遭到槍殺。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
